MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description: Kalitte is an an independent software vendor focused on development, implementation and maintenance of large scale governmental and military application software projects.

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: JDash allows you to integrate end user designed dashbords into your application.
Site.Site_Description_250: Provide personalized start pages and modern dashboards to your users. Imagine your users can customize start page of your application and create their own dashboards. With JDash.Net each user can put exactly what he wants to see in his dashboard.
Site.Site_Description_450: Dashboards, todays IT fashion, are getting very powerful tools for decision makers in every industry. Users love dashboards once they discover what is it and how to benefit. jDash, taking this one step further, adds incredible value to every IT project by seamless integration for developers and simple clicks for users. With jDash your project will have competition superiority. Consider this unique but "must have" tool.
Site.Site_Keywords: asp.net dashboard,dashboard software,bi dashboard,c# dashboard,google like dashboard,igoogle dashboard,executive dashboard,.net dashboard,drag drop dashboard,start page

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: The trial version of JDash.Net can be freely distributed over the internet in an unchaged form

Press_Release.Press_Release:
Provide personalized start pages and modern dashboards to your users. Imagine your users can customize start page of your application and create their own dashboards. Each user can put exactly what he wants to see in his dashboard and collaborate with others.
Result is highly satisfied happy customers and reduced maintenance costs.
Press_Release.Headline: JDash.Net for Asp.Net
Press_Release.Summary: Provide personalized start pages and modern dashboards to your users.
Press_Release.Press_Release_Plain:
Provide personalized start pages and modern dashboards to your users. Imagine your users can customize start page of your application and create their own dashboards. Each user can put exactly what he wants to see in his dashboard and collaborate with others.
Result is highly satisfied happy customers and reduced maintenance costs.

English.Keywords: asp.net dashboard,dashboard software,bi dashboard,c# dashboard,google like dashboard,igoogle dashboard,executive dashboard,.net dashboard,drag drop dashboard,start page
English.Char_Desc_80: JDash allows you to integrate end user designed dashbords into your application.
English.Char_Desc_250: Provide personalized start pages and modern dashboards to your users. Imagine your users can customize start page of your application and create their own dashboards. With JDash.Net each user can put exactly what he wants to see in his dashboard.
English.Char_Desc_450: Dashboards, todays IT fashion, are getting very powerful tools for decision makers in every industry. Users love dashboards once they discover what is it and how to benefit. jDash, taking this one step further, adds incredible value to every IT project by seamless integration for developers and simple clicks for users. With jDash your project will have competition superiority. Consider this unique but "must have" tool.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Imagine this:
Your users are able to customize start page of your application and create their own dashboards using your dashlets.
And you develop dashlets as regular Asp.Net user controls - ascx files. So cool ? And now even easy! Dashboards are great ways for end users to understand and monitor current status of their business.
With JDash.Net, you allow them to create and design their own dashboards using desktop or mobile devices with simple drag-drops. Result is highly satisfied happy customers and reduced maintenance costs.
Key features - Responsive design. Mobile and desktop fully supported. - Seemlessly integratable into your application. - Use your current Asp.Net skills for development. - Supports multiple layouts, not limited to only columns. - Database and browser independent. MsSQL and MySql included.
